description.value: The risk of an adverse reaction (allergy or intolerance) for this patient upon exposure to the substance (including pharmaceutical products).

copyright.value: This material derives from the HL7 Terminology (THO). THO is copyright Â©1989+ Health Level Seven International and is made available under the CC0 designation. For more licensing information see: https://terminology.hl7.org/license.html

definition.value: Known risk of allergy or intolerance reaction upon exposure to the specified substance.
No known risk of allergy or intolerance reaction upon exposure to the specified substance.
